title: god champions in low elo
body: champions like {{champion:5}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:36}} all dominate low elo  build a devourer on xin and udyr and you cant stop them, while the item is being removed it will nerf udyr but xin can still go with {{item:3124}} {{item:3153}} and be unstoppable. there are more than just those champions but in low elo they seem so unbalanced. even if I'm 20-5 a xin with devour rageblade still kills me with ease, another thing is towers, so many times have I been dove and the squishy enemy not die and live with less than 100 hp the towers seem very weak right now, the game in low elo at least just seems like who can kill who the most.

replies.body: Don't build devourer on udyr it's inconsistent in my experience playing as and against him. Warrior for tiger stance is better but runic and phoenix stance just feels better to me.
Just play shaco or Eve and laugh at gold- players
7 more days and then you say (type) how xin is gutted and needs buff.
